about_the_game:
These character chips feature a variety of cars bustling through the city.

From personal cars full of memories to police cars involved in incidents and ambulances with life-saving drama, each vehicle adds a new story.

Bring fresh, vibrant tales to your world with these detailed designs!

*******************************************

Characters: 25

*******************************************
